comments.body:
why was this type renamed? doing so disrupts the autoconversion generation

edit: hmmm... looks related to https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/91625/files#r434015606 ... that's pretty unfortunate ... hand-maintaining lots of boilerplate conversion is equally error-prone.

Yes, it was done to have a clearer name and avoid confusion. There is no intention to ever change this `LegacyExtender` as it's going to be removed in the future with the policy config after Scheduler component config graduates to GA.
+1 Marking the type as `LegacyExtender` should be a signal for devs that we don't intent to change this type anymore until we have satisfied the criteria for removing it.
